name: mat4900
text: Is this the first mention of Bensington Butters, or have i missed an earlier one?

name: junko
text: You are correct.

name: mat4900
text: Thanks for that. I couldn't find a earlier reference, but i wanted to be sure.

name: semiquaver
text: There is a search feature which makes such reference simple, my dear friend.  Not that there's any problem with asking.

name: lolsworth
text: There might not have been two years ago.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Except that there was (the search function is older than assetbar).

name: lolsworth
text: I have only been here since assetbar, I did not know such things, I am ashamed.

name: semiquaver
text: Something about history and repeating it.

name: lolsworth
text: Something About England

name: catachresis
text: Oh come on doggs how is the payoff in this strip not worth a solid 5

name: soticoto
text: Because it is not as side-rippingly, gut-spillingly hilarious as about 50% of the Philippe strips, and isn't even at Ray's best.

name: patkun
text: Waterbury's thinly desguised disdain of Ray's lifestyle is the best part.

name: epicurus
text: Man, ray is bad at that.

name: tinhand
text:
See, now I knew when I read the Bensington Butters arc that I had heard that name before, but I just couldn't put my finger on it...until I selected a random comic and found this strip. The satisfaction of that gets this comic a 4.
Ray should think more positively about his eccentricities.

name: zedpower
text: If I was Ray, I'd have it in my contract that people have to say good stuff about my dick.

name: tekende
text: It is a rather nice dick, sir.

name: rotavele
text: So I guess this confirms that while Ray has been neutered his balls remain.  Perhaps he was never neutered and there was just hell of gymnasts around him at all times.

name: deusoma
text: If the balls remain, by definition, neutering has not occured.

name: straw
text: I actually just pressed random from the neutering strip and got this one. Unheimlich .

name: ezcmac
text: Your balls have to be mighty legendary to distinguish between the speech of gymnasts and non-gymnasts.

name: jlowe424
text: It is actually basically a well-known fact that all balls react this way to the speech of gymnasts.  It has been proven by many people such as scientists.

name: dumase
text: Waterbury thinks Ray is batman.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Waterbury is Ray's batman!

...Or have I just blown your mind?

name: dumase
text: You have metaphorically performed fellatio on my brain.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Teodor: Oh great
Philippe: I have fifty dollars!

name: mattylite
text: Waterbury's little spiel takes on a different light if you think of Ray as not even having eyes.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: That's the only thing I could think about while I read this strip... Ray's jealous of Bensingon Butters' eyes.

name: zadig
text: Ray says "when gymnasts speak," not "when I hear gymnasts speak."  Could this possibly mean when gymnasts are speaking anywhere, at any time? Because if so, Ray's balls are rarely in the fully-descended position.

name: hellofditties
text: I love how Ray types each thought as it comes, without erasure. Stabbed... broke... no. hm

name: punkmonkey
text: A thinly veiled Great Gatsby reference perhaps? It is said that he once killed a man also.

name: tekende
text: Only when staring at the green light do Gatsby's balls fully descend.

name: homeskool
text:
This strip made me laugh out loud.

Only thing about it is that it sounded less like a laugh and more like I just been pushed off a cliff.

name: rykan
text: If he were blogging, he would be wearing a crown...

name: mr_lostman28
text:
Possible myths to expand assetbar notoriety:
Once was a woman.

No, no, too nasty... hm

When Nickelback fans speak, my eyes immediately glaze over and I lose conciousness.

name: laserblade
text: OK, you tried very hard so you get a chubby.

name: howl
text: Ray crosses his arms the wrong way around.

name: dtuba
text: How is this wrong? (Perhaps Ray is left handed,like me....?"

name: howl
text: I didn't think of that. I don't think he is though.

name: dtuba
text: I am going to research this. Good excuse to start a new archive trawl.

name: carlyle
text: God, I've had that second eccentricity for, like, all of my purberty.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i heard sumo wrestlers learn how to pull their balls up inside their abdomen.

name: ham_shoes
text: I think their abdomens just hang down over them

name: greenkoolayd
text: i think that youre just making fun of fat dudes.
